name: com.htc.upm.wave.openxr.toolkit
description:
The "VIVE OpenXR ToolKit - Android" package is a toolkit built on top of the "VIVE OpenXR Plugin - Android" package.
While the "VIVE OpenXR Plugin - Android" package provides the basic plugin of OpenXR, the "VIVE OpenXR ToolKit - Android" package provides additional APIs, Components, and GUI interfaces that makes your developerment easier.
Current provided tools are shown in the following.

- Hand Tracking APIs
- Raycast APIs
- CompositionLayer Components


You can view the documentation for additional information.
